Translator: Instant Translation at Your Fingertips
✨ Say goodbye to language barriers! With Translator, translating words and phrases directly from any webpage has never been easier.

🌟 Key Features:

🚀 Instant Translation: Highlight any text and get an immediate translation in your preferred language.
🌐 Supports 100+ Languages: Break communication barriers with translations from around the world.
🎛️ Customizable Options: Set your default languages or use shortcuts for faster access.
🪶 Lightweight & Non-Intrusive: Works quietly in the background without slowing you down.
🔒 Privacy First:

🔐 Local Processing: All text detection happens securely in your browser. We never track or store your data.
✅ Your Control: Only the highlighted text is sent for translation, ensuring maximum privacy.
🎓 Perfect for: Students, professionals, travelers, or anyone curious about learning new languages. 🌟

📥 Download QuickTranslate now and unlock the power of effortless communication! ✨
